Tag_Youmay.description: the memory | the [[Theos the Stargazer | mercenary]]

MemoryInfobox.name: Theos the Stargazer
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Theos the Stargazer|Theos had never set his sights lower than the stars. He was constantly killing his way up the ladder of power... so naturally his path crossed with Kassandra's.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted'

General_Description: '''Theos the Stargazer''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: At the request of the old [[Ide|lady]], Kassandra sought out the [[mercenary]] known as [[Theos the Stargazer]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted]]''
